mapper.select: select subjectCode from subject where subjectName=#{subjectName}
mapper.update: update subject set subjectName=#{subjectName} where subjectCode=#{subjectCode}
mapper.select: select s.subjectCode, s.subjectName from member as m join subject as s on m.subjectCode = s.subjectCode where m.uid = #{uid} order by subjectName
select subjectName, subjectCode from subject where uid=#{uid} order by subjectName
mapper.insert: insert into member (uid, subjectCode, grade, classNumber, studentNumber) values (#{uid}, #{subjectCode}, #{grade}, #{classNumber}, #{studentNumber})
